â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ                                                                         â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ

â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ life: recruiting, negotiating contracts with cyclists and sponsors,     â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ
â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ managing staff, training and handling the race calendarÃ  your role will â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ
â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ also be critical during the races themselves since you will need to     â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ
â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ make real time key decisions during the different stages. Play solo or  â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ
â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ challenge managers from all over the world in an entirely redesigned    â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ
â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ online multiplayer mode.                                                â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ
